name: ice-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.x-y: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.
